title: Banana and oat bites
directions: 1 Preheat the oven to 180°C/gas mark 4. CHILDREN: Mash the bananas in a bowl, then mix in the oats, apple sauce and ground cinnamon.

2 CHILDREN: Divide the mixture into 10 equal balls and put on a baking sheet lined with baking paper, leaving space between each one. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until golden. Remove and cool on a wire rack. Click here for other healthier recipes the kids will love - and for more about Active Kids, here’s everything you need to know.
